name: Bresslergroup
overview:
Bresslergroup is a product design firm that offers innovative and creative solutions to an array of industries. Trust Bresslergroup with consumer, medical or commercial projects including user research, industrial and interface design and engineering for production. Our talented staff has also developed several core areas of expertise including integrated interaction & industrial design for deeper brand experiences, medical product development driven by PhD led research, and technical innovation to commercialize emergent technologies and satisfy unmet user needs.

With more than 40 years of experience developing innovative products for trusted brands, Bresslergroup continues to tackle a very broad range of product development challenges. We strive to create cutting-edge and user-friendly products for consumers and industry professionals.
